attributes.action: Ask the PM to give some guarantees that Heatherwood Hospital will not be closed or cut down in any way to pay off the Trust's overspend due to their mismanagement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For Gordon to prove his Fairness for everyone slogan by giving a guarantee that Heatherwood Hospital will not be sacrificed in any way to pay for the Trust overdraft, and to use some of the money he is splashing about to give this hospital a future.
